Header: Inaugural party leaders meeting to be held today
Content: Colombo (News1st): The inaugural Party Leaders meeting for 2019 will be held at 11.30 AM today (January 4). The meeting will be chaired by Speaker Karu Jayasuriya. The meeting is expected to hold discussions on a date for the 2019 budget presentation and other matters. Meanwhile, they will also set up the agenda of Parliament for the 8th of January, 2019.
